FSL Brain Extraction Tool
*************************

.. autofunction:: docs.scripts.bet


Pseudocode
~~~~~~~~~~

References
~~~~~~~~~~	
The tool employed for skull stripping/brain extraction is `FSL's BET <http://fsl.fmrib.ox.ac.uk/fsl/fslwiki/BET/UserGuide>`_. More information about the BET algorithm can be found `online <http://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/10.1002/hbm.10062/epdf>`_.
